title: Is there a spirit 'world' after death? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on the spirit. If they lived a full decent life and passed away with no regrets, more than likely they’ll crossover. If they they had a premature death, died violently, lived a not so good life, suicide, or just not ready to leave for whatever…more than likely they will be stuck earthbound. Earthbound means the spirit gets stuck between our earthly dimension and the spirit world. We call these beings earthbound spirits or ghosts, An earthbound ghost is simply a human spirit that has not properly passed over. They remain behind on earth, and account for many ghost sightings and haunted places.

There is not just one spirit world. There are many. I think that the best way to know that you know that you know that there is a spirit world is to have undeniably seen the proof. Until you see it for yourself, you feel compelled to determine whether or not the person making the claims has either an ulterior motive or a tendency to hallucinate. If you see it once, you can see it again and again and again.  Mom Sees Ghost Of Son After It Triggers Her Home's Security Camera | KOST 103.5
